step_feedback.feedback: For rep 1, try to bring your right shoulder back and down a bit more. For rep 2, your left shoulder movement looks good, but let's focus on bringing the right shoulder back and down more smoothly.
For rep 1, your left shoulder movement is excellent! For rep 2, try to keep your right elbow a little closer to your body as you roll your shoulder back and down.
For rep 1, your left shoulder movement is great. For rep 2, try to squeeze your shoulder blades together more as you roll them back and down.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a circular motion. Try to inhale deeply when pulling your shoulders back to help with breathing.
